# `ConversationContentWheelPicker` Definition

Wheel Picker object for representing single selection of selectable items.

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | Optional unique identifier to help map component replies to form messages where multiple Wheel Pickers can be present. |
| items | [`ConversationContentWheelPickerItem[]`](conversationcontentwheelpickeritem-definition.md) | Yes | The main text displayed for the item. |
